userStories.story: As an admin user, I want to log into the system with my credentials so that I can access administrative functions.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Displays success message on correct credentials; shows error on invalid credentials.

userStories.story: As an admin, I want to log out of the system so that my session can be securely ended.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Returns user to login screen and ends session.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to register a new account by providing personal information so that I can access the system.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Creates new user record and shows success or error message.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to log into the system using my username and password so that I can access my account.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Displays dashboard on success, error message on failure.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to update my account details so that my profile information stays current.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Saves new profile information and displays confirmation.
validationStates: All required fields must have values

userStories.story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access to my account if I forget it.
userStories.expectedBehavior: Sends reset token or email; shows confirmation or error message.
validationStates: Show error if user not found
